page.title: 03SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Although Havant gives the impression of affluence,there are many problems. Unemployment,particularly of young people,is increasing.In Leigh Park many public areas are subjected to vandalism,costing thousands of pounds to repair.Drug Abuse is increasing, with Heroin-addiction a major problem. Solvent abuse is popular among small groups of adolescents.Child-abuse statistics show that Leigh Park has the worst record in Hampshire. The breakdown of marriages is becoming common,with resulting social problems. Several parts of Leigh Park suffer from housing problems,particularly in early system-built units,where damp rots the fabric. Self-help organisations have grown in the area,based at Point Seven and Focus 230.
